BG.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
BG.description: Many years ago, Mega Man X—a blue robot possessing high intelligence, a kind personality and formidable power—was found and studied by Dr. Cain. The scientist attempted to create more in the likeness of the robot, calling them 'Reploids'. However, some of the Reploids began to malfunction, and these were called 'Mavericks'. The 'Maverick Hunters', a group of capable Reploids like Mega Man X, Zero and Sigma, was assembled to fix the situation. However, one day, Sigma revolts and hacks into the Mother Computer, causing the Mavericks to grow in power. With chaos brewing on the horizon, Mega Man X must join forces with Middy, a genius hacker, and his partner Zero to restore peace. Blast through the past, defeat strong robotic enemies and obtain new abilities as you clean up crime in this action-packed platformer!

CH.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
CH.description: Mega Man X — ein blauer Roboter mit hoher Intelligenz, einer gütigen Persönlichkeit und beeindruckender Macht — wurde vor vielen Jahren von Dr. Cain entdeckt und studiert. Der Wissenschaftler versuchte, weitere Roboter nach dessen Vorbild zu erschaffen, die er 'Reploids' nannte. Doch einige der Reploids, die sogenannten Kampfroboter, erlitten Fehlfunktionen. Die 'Kampfroboter-Jäger', eine Gruppe fähiger Reploids wie Mega Man X, Zero und Sigma, wurde zusammengestellt, um der Situation wieder Herr zu werden. Doch eines Tages revoltierte Sigma und hackte sich in den Muttercomputer, was den Kampfrobotern noch mehr Macht verlieh. Während sich am Horizont das Chaos zusammenbraut, muss Mega Man X gemeinsam mit seinem Partner Zero und Middy, einem genialen Hacker, wieder für Frieden sorgen. Reise durch die Vergangenheit, besiege starke gegnerische Roboter und erlange neue Fähigkeiten, während du in diesem actiongeladenen Plattformer Verbrechen bekämpfst!

BE.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
BE.description: Il y a bien longtemps, Mega Man X, robot bleu à l'intelligence exceptionnelle et possédant une puissance hors du commun, fut découvert et étudié par le Dr Cain. Le scientifique tenta de créer des répliques du fameux robot, et conçut ainsi les "Réploïdes". Malheureusement, certains d'entre eux commencèrent à montrer des signes de défaillance. Ces derniers furent appelés les "Mavericks". Les Chasseurs de Mavericks, groupe de Réploïdes dont font partie Mega Man X, Zero et Sigma, furent réunis pour rétablir l'ordre. Mais un jour, Sigma se révolta et pirata l'ordinateur-mère, rendant ainsi les Mavericks encore plus puissants. Dans un futur menacé par le chaos, Mega Man X, son fidèle partenaire Zero et le hacker génial Middy décident de rassembler leurs forces pour restaurer la paix. Faites un saut dans le passé, anéantissez les robots maléfiques et obtenez de nouvelles capacités qui vous permettront de combattre le crime cybernétique dans ce jeu de plateformes à sensations !

ES.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
ES.description: Hace muchos años, el Dr. Cain descubrió un androide de gran inteligencia, nobleza y poderes excepcionales llamado Mega Man X. Tras someterlo a diferentes análisis, trató de crear más robots como él, a los que bautizó con el nombre de reploides. Sin embargo, algunos de los nuevos androides comenzaron a presentar fallos de funcionamiento. Para neutralizar esta amenaza, nacieron los Cazadores de Robots Rebeldes, un grupo formado por hábiles reploides como Mega Man X, Zero y Sigma. Para complicar aún más la situación, Sigma decide sublevarse, acceder al ordenador principal y otorgar a los robots rebeldes más poder. En este escenario de caos, Mega Man X debe unir sus fuerzas a las de Middy, un genial pirata informático, y a las de su compañero Zero para restablecer la paz. Viaja al pasado, derrota a los poderosos robots enemigos y obtén nuevas habilidades mientras luchas contra el crimen en este juego de plataformas repleto de acción.

IT.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
IT.description: In un lontano passato il Dr. Cain progettò un robot blu dotato di un elevato quoziente intellettivo, di una natura nobile e di incredibili poteri: il suo nome era Mega Man X. Lo scienziato decise di realizzare dei cloni cibernetici della sua creazione, i "Reploid". Ma a causa di un malfunzionamento alcuni di essi, i cosiddetti "Maverick", iniziarono a ribellarsi. Per risolvere la situazione furono presto istituiti i cacciatori di Maverick, un'unità di Reploid avanzati, tra i quali Mega Man X, Zero e Sigma. Finché un giorno quest'ultimo riuscì a introdursi nella rete del computer madre con l'intento di aiutare la rivolta dei Maverick per la conquista del potere. La situazione è quasi fuori controllo! Mega Man X deve entrare in azione e riportare la pace con l'aiuto di Middy, un genio dell'informatica, e del suo fedele compagno Zero. Viaggia nel passato, affronta potenti nemici robotici e ottieni tante nuove abilità mentre sconfiggi il male in questo gioco a piattaforme pieno d'azione!

NL.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
NL.description: Mega Man X is een intelligente, vriendelijke en krachtige robot die vele jaren geleden door Dr. Cain werd gevonden en bestudeerd. De geleerde probeerde robots naar gelijkenis van Mega Man X te produceren en noemde deze exemplaren “Reploids”. Een aantal exemplaren vertoonde echter problemen en werden “Mavericks” genoemd. Om deze groep te bestrijden vormden onder andere Mega Man X, Zero en Sigma de groep “Maverick Hunters”. Echter, op een dag koos Sigma de kant van de “Mavericks”: hij kraakte het hoofdsysteem Mother Computer waardoor de “Mavericks” in kracht toenamen. Om vrede te doen terugkeren bundelt Mega Man X zijn krachten met briljant computerkraker Middy en partner Zero. Reis door de tijd, versla sterke robotvijanden en vergaar nieuwe vaardigheden in dit actievolle platformspel!

PT.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
PT.description: Há muitos anos atrás, Dr. Cain encontrou e estudou Mega Man X, um robô azul muito inteligente, com uma personalidade bondosa e um poder formidável. O cientista tentou criar réplicas do robô e deu-lhes o nome de "Reploids". No entanto, alguns dos Reploids começaram a ter avarias e receberam o nome de "Mavericks". Os "Maverick Hunters", um grupo de Reploids competentes como Mega Man X, Zero e Sigma, foi constituído para resolver a situação. Porém, um dia, Sigma revoltou-se e acedeu ao Mother Computer (computador principal) e aumentou, assim, o poder dos Mavericks. Com o caos no horizonte, Mega Man X terá de formar uma aliança com Middy, um pirata informático genial, e com o seu parceiro Zero de modo a restaurar a paz. Enfrenta o passado, derrota poderosos inimigos robóticos e obtém novas habilidades à medida que combates o crime neste jogo de plataformas repleto de ação!

MT.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme

RU.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
RU.description: Много лет назад, Mega Man X – синий робот, обладатель высокого интеллекта, доброй души и внушительной силы был найден доктором Кейном. Ученый попытался создать других роботов по его подобию, назвав их “Реплоидами”. Однако некоторые из роботов оказались неисправными, и были названы “Маверикс”. “Охотники на Маверикс” – группа выдающихся Реплоидов, включающая Mega Man X, Zero (Зеро) и Sigma (Сигма) была создана для того чтобы исправить ситуацию. Но однажды Сигма восстает и проникает в Mother Computer (Материнский Компьютер), после чего сила Маверксов начинает расти. Чтобы противостоять растущему хаосу, Х должен объединить свои силы с гениальным хакером Middy (Мидди) и его партнером Zero (Зеро), чтобы восстановить порядок. Вернись в прошлое, одолей враждебных роботов и обрети новые способности, в то время пока ты борешься с преступностью в этом полном действия платформере.

SE.description: Many years ago, Mega Man X—a blue robot possessing high intelligence, a kind personality and formidable power—was found and studied by Dr. Cain. Blast through the past, defeat strong robotic enemies and obtain new abilities as you clean up crime in this action-packed platformer!

NZ.name: Mega Man™ Xtreme
NZ.description: Many years ago, Mega Man X—a blue robot possessing high intelligence, a kind personality and formidable power—was found and studied by Dr. Cain. The scientist attempted to create more in the likeness of the robot, calling them 'Reploids'. However, some of the Reploids began to malfunction, and these were called 'Mavericks'. The 'Maverick Hunters', a group of capable Reploids like Mega Man X, Zero and Sigma, was assembled to fix the situation. However, one day, Sigma revolts and hacks into the Mother Computer, causing the Mavericks to grow in power. With chaos brewing on the horizon, Mega Man X must join forces with Middy, a genius hacker, and his partner Zero to restore peace. Blast through the past, defeat strong robotic enemies and obtain new abilities as you clean up crime in this action-packed platformer!

RO.description: Many years ago, Mega Man X—a blue robot possessing high intelligence, a kind personality and formidable power—was found and studied by Dr. Cain. The scientist attempted to create more in the likeness of the robot, calling them 'Reploids'. However, some of the Reploids began to malfunction, and these were called 'Mavericks'. The 'Maverick Hunters', a group of capable Reploids like Mega Man X, Zero and Sigma, was assembled to fix the situation. However, one day, Sigma revolts and hacks into the Mother Computer, causing the Mavericks to grow in power. With chaos brewing on the horizon, Mega Man X must join forces with Middy, a genius hacker, and his partner Zero to restore peace. Blast through the past, defeat strong robotic enemies and obtain new abilities as you clean up crime in this action-packed platformer!
